DOC.criteria: age 18 yr estimate glomerular filtration rate ( GFR ) < 60 ml/min/1.73m2 Chronic renal replacement therapy ( hemodialysis , peritoneal dialysis , continuous renal replacement therapy ) Pregnancy lactation Use contrast agent within 1 week Emergent CAG PCI Not recover AKI ( acute kidney injury ) Use nephrotoxic drug within 48 hr Cardiogenic shock ( SBP ( systolic blood pressure ) < 90 mmHg ) pulmonary edema Uncontrolled hypertension ( SBP ≥ 200 mmHg DBP ( diastolic blood pressure ) ≥ 130 mmHg ) History hypersensitivity contrast agent Known allergy hypersensitivity EPO ( erythropoietin ) Use EPO within 1 month Anemia ( hemoglobin < 9 g/dL ) Ventilatory care
